inclusion.criterion: Psychosocially, mentally, and physically able to comply with protocol
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to participate in post-operative follow-up evaluations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No previous surgical intervention at involved fusion level(s)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential not pregnant or nursing
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Systemic infection or infection at surgical site
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Medical condition interfering with post-operative assessments and care
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concurrent disease process placing subject in excessive risk to surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is seeking spinal fusion. However, they have a history of hypertension and chronic pain, which may be relevant for post-operative care.
